Note Taking Apps ​

Apps dedicated to Note Taking

NoteApps.Info - Feature comparisons

Text Based ​

  • Notion ✓
  • SimpleNote
  • Obsidian ✓ - Locally Stored Markdown Notes
  • Standard Notes - E2EE Notes
  • Notesnook ✓ - E2EE Notes
  • OneNote ✓ - Both Handwritten and Text
  • RemNote ✓ - Notes and Flashcards

Handwritten Notes ​

  • GoodNotes - For iPad
  • OneNote ✓ - Both Handwritten and Text
